fixes.name: Selected Year Filter
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau expression YEAR([OrderDate]) = [Parameters].[Select Year] to DAX. Replaced the row column reference with 'order_items+'[OrderDate] and the parameter with SELECTEDVALUE('Select Year'[Display As]). The expression returns a boolean result usable as a filter measure.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The formula references a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[Select Year]); per rules, any calculation that uses parameters must be created as a measure.
